paraphrased_prediction: In 6 to 12 months, vibe writing will emerge as a significant trend due to advancements in LLM technology.
exact_quote: Vibe Writing will be a thing in 6-12 months if not the next couple of months.

paraphrased_prediction: Hypersonic weapons will significantly shift the balance of military power in the next five years.
exact_quote: Watch them very carefully because more than anything else, they will shift the balance of military power in the next five years.

paraphrased_prediction: In 10 years or more, firms that do not deploy AI effectively will go out of business.
exact_quote: Then, as AI becomes more important as a competitive edge, firms that do not deploy AI effectively will go out of business. This process could take 10 years or more, coming in fits and spurts, as has happened with most previous major technological innovations.

paraphrased_prediction: Sub-Saharan Africa's GDP will fall by 21 percent by 2099 due to temperature increases.
exact_quote: For sub-Saharan Africa, gdp falls by 21 percent, but for Europe gdp rises by 0.6 percent, again by 2099.

paraphrased_prediction: In a year and a half, some economies may be open to tourism, despite lacking proof of safety.
exact_quote: A year and a half from now, some of those countries likely will be open to tourism. They won’t be able to prove they are safe, but they might be fine nonetheless.

paraphrased_prediction: In the 2020s, we will see ubiquitous participation by AIs in prediction markets.
exact_quote: we can expect to see in the 2020s that we did not see in the 2010s: the possibility of ubiquitous participation by AIs.

paraphrased_prediction: In 2024, the author will not be covering certain political topics.
exact_quote: This is exactly what I am _not_ going to cover in 2024.

paraphrased_prediction: 2022 will be seen as a year where established economic theories proved accurate.
exact_quote: This is the year that orthodoxy took its revenge.

paraphrased_prediction: Within the next 50 years, the West will influence global culture to favor WEIRD values, leading to a decrease in cultural diversity.
exact_quote: I predict that we — the West — are going to WEIRDify the entire world, within the next 50 years, the next two generations.

paraphrased_prediction: By July 2021, most of the U.S. pandemic will be over.
exact_quote: Most of the U.S. pandemic will be over by July, even under a subpar vaccination schedule.

paraphrased_prediction: In a year and a half, some poorer countries will likely be open to tourism despite not being able to prove their safety.
exact_quote: A year and a half from now, some of those countries likely will be open to tourism. They won’t be able to prove they are safe, but they might be fine nonetheless.

paraphrased_prediction: Most of the rest of the economy can be reopened over the course of July 2020 once the essential sector stabilizes.
exact_quote: Once that’s accomplished, I think we can, over the course of July, reintroduce most of the rest of the economy...

paraphrased_prediction: By mid-April 2020, the emergency response to COVID-19 will peak and start to improve.
exact_quote: I expect the emergency will peak in mid-April and then things will slowly start to get improve.

paraphrased_prediction: Lemin Wu's upcoming book will be the best and most important economics book of 2020.
exact_quote: But for the last few years he was been working and writing, and later in 2020 he has a book coming out in China, in Chinese, title still undetermined. I am willing to predict it will be the best and most important economics book of the year, in any language.

paraphrased_prediction: Over the next 30 years, pension systems will require young workers to fund significantly less generous systems by 2040.
exact_quote: …over the next 30 years or so, many countries’ pension systems will require young workers to fund a system that everyone knows will be far less generous by 2040.

paraphrased_prediction: The Clippers are set to be better than any other NBA team this year unless an injury occurs.
exact_quote: I say this year there is no parity, and the Clippers (barring injury) are clearly better than any other team.

paraphrased_prediction: In the next 20 years, there will be a competition between financial institutions, social networks, and decentralized blockchain solutions over who manages and verifies individual identities.
exact_quote: One thing that we might see in the next 20 years is a fight between financial institutions and social networks and decentralized blockchain builders over who gets to be the keeper and verifier of everyone’s identity.

paraphrased_prediction: In 500 years, people will admire the Akshardham Temple for its construction without robots.
exact_quote: My view, however, is that in 500 years people will flock to this site and marvel at how it was made without use of any robots.

paraphrased_prediction: Greece will vote itself out of the eurozone, potentially starting in late 2014.
exact_quote: I say yes.

paraphrased_prediction: Brazil and Mexico will not turn around the fading economic fortunes of Latin America in 2015.
exact_quote: I say no, not this coming year at least. Not next year either.

paraphrased_prediction: By late November 2013, more parts of the ACA exchanges will be working but not enough for effective enrollment.
exact_quote: More parts of the thing will be working by late November, but not enough for it to serve as a functioning enrollment system, much less encourage 'the invincibles' to sign up.

paraphrased_prediction: By January 1, 2014, hundreds of thousands of Americans will lose their individual health coverage due to ACA standards.
exact_quote: Come January 1, hundreds of thousands of Americans will lose their individual coverage packages for not meeting ACA standards.

paraphrased_prediction: By March 2014, the ACA exchanges will mostly be functioning, but the risk pool will be dysfunctional.
exact_quote: The exchanges will be mostly working by March 2014, but by then the risk pool will be dysfunctional.

paraphrased_prediction: By October 2014, most people will not view the ACA exchanges as a satisfactory solution.
exact_quote: By October 2014, no one will think the exchanges are a satisfactory solution, except for 17 state exchanges which will be running reasonably well.

paraphrased_prediction: In 50 years, many poor people will no longer live in major cities like Manhattan or Los Angeles but will be in locations with lower rents.
exact_quote: And I think 50 years from now we’ll look back on that and be shocked at the notion that so many poor people got to live in Manhattan, Los Angeles, wherever we are talking about. Because in the future they will be in other places with lower rents.

paraphrased_prediction: In five years, researchers should look for ways to challenge the cash transfer movement.
exact_quote: If I were an enterprising young researcher looking for an idea and experiments that will prove powerful in five years, I would try to find the stake I can drive into the heart of the cash transfer movement.

paraphrased_prediction: Episode 7 of Star Wars might be released in 2015.
exact_quote: Episode 7 might come as soon as 2015.

paraphrased_prediction: By 2030, more than two-thirds of Brazilians will be in the middle class.
exact_quote: More than two-thirds of Brazilians are likely to count themselves as middle class by 2030.

paraphrased_prediction: In 2030, central and Latin America will have as many middle class consumers as North America.
exact_quote: In the same year, central and Latin America will have as many middle class consumers as North America.

paraphrased_prediction: In the next twenty years, a middling university might spend its endowment to become a leader in online education.
exact_quote: This might change in the next twenty years. One can imagine a middling school running down its endowment to spend its way to leadership in on-line education.

paraphrased_prediction: Natural gas and other energy source developments will likely make North America the cheap energy power for much of the next fifty years.
exact_quote: Natural gas and other energy source developments will likely make North America the cheap energy power for much of the next fifty years; this may improve the quality of our foreign policy as a collateral benefit.

paraphrased_prediction: Serious contractionary monetary policy may occur in the next five years.
exact_quote: I certainly would not predict hyperinflation, but we could be in for some serious contractionary monetary policy in the next five years.

paraphrased_prediction: Intelligent agent modeling will remain relevant in economics for at least the next twenty years.
exact_quote: What can be done will be done and so people will build intelligent models for at least the next twenty years.
